name: Fractured Months of the Year Quiz | Fractured Words | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Thanksgiving.

	November is general election month. It's also the month when JFK was assassinated (on 11/22/1963). It is author George Eliot's birthday month; it's also my little sister's and mine.

Tax Day.

	Easter and Passover usually happen in April. It's my mom's, my boyfriend's, and my friend Rob's birthday month.

options: birthday of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
questions.explanation:
Halloween.

	According to an ancient calendar, October was the eighth month--that's why it has the same root as "octagon." It's my older sister's birthday month.

none of these.

	I don't know of any August holidays, but my nieces Shelby and Robyn were both born in August.

St. Patrick's Day

	Sometimes Passover and/or Easter happen in March, too.

Labor Day.

	Also, September is Back to School month for many kids. Sadly, we'll be commemorating 9/11/2001 for the rest of our lives.

Summer Solstice.

	Father's Day is in June. So is my dad's birthday.

questions.correct: birthday of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
questions.explanation:
birthday of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

	In January we celebrate New Year's Day as well as MLK's birthday. It's also my niece Taylor's birthday month.

New Year's Eve.

	December brings Kwaanza, Hannukah (sometimes starts in November), Christmas, Winter Soltice, and of course my nephew Pablo's birthday on New Year's Eve.

Presidents' Day.

	February also brings Valentine's Day and African American History Month. For July I might have used jewel + deny. Thanks for taking the quiz!
